rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.DistanceMeasure

Class DTWNumerical

  • java.lang.Object
    • rs.fon.whibo.problem.AbstractComponent
      • rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.DistanceMeasure.AbstractDistanceMeasure
        • rs.fon.whibo.GC.component.DistanceMeasure.DTWNumerical
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceMeasure

    public class DTWNumerical
extends AbstractDistanceMeasure
    A distance measure based on "Dynamic Time Warping". The DTW distance is mapped to a similarity measure using f(x)= 1 - (x / (1 + x)). Feature weights are also supported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new DTW numerical distance measure.
